short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adding Animal Now search engine to Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Animal Search Now extension allows you to set our partner search engine as your primary search provider in the address bar.
Animal Search Now extension allows you to quickly and conveniently search directly from the context menu.
Our partner search engine is an alternative search engine with the ability to search for content in various sources with an emphasis on user privacy.

By installing and using Animal Tab Now, you automatically accept the Terms of Use https://animaltabnow.com/terms.html and the Privacy Policy https://animaltabnow.com/privacy.html.
